tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: True Calling
programme.desc: When a petty officer smuggles a pregnant Serbian woman aboard the carrier in order to save her from a vengeful fiancée, he's arrested and scheduled to be court-martialed.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Psychic Warrior
programme.desc: When a Navy research project involving ESP and psychic phenomenon goes awry, resulting in the death of one of the research subjects, the Admiral in charge is court-martialed.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Rouge
programme.desc: As the lowest ranking lawyer at JAG, Bud is assigned to accompany Raglan, a former Special Forces operative who is hired by the Pentagon to test security at military bases.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Mishap
programme.desc: Skates", Harm's RIO when he was aboard the USS Patrick Henry, was the Landing Safety Officer in charge of the deck when a Tomcat crashes while making an emergency landing.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Into the Breach
programme.desc: Harm and Mac agree to help guide young student "attorneys" at Iron Forge Naval Academy, a prep school for the US Naval Academy, as they conduct a mock trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Boomerang (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hostilities between Harm and Brumby escalate both in and out of the courtroom and it takes Chegwidden, with Brumby's CO's approval to get them to deal with their anger.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Bunker Games
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with Toby's nemesis, Quincy Berkstead and his wife, Amy , when they are locked inside an artificially intelligent doomsday bunker that aims to kill them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Wave Goodbye
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must prevent an incoming tsunami from hitting a vulnerable nuclear power facility, and Toby secretly helps his ex-fiancée retrieve her stolen identity.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 2
programme.desc: Whatever was making itself known to the team earlier, continues in this episode as\nsomething seems to be following Yvette from the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 2
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Tamworth and a beautiful manor house that is said to be filled with\nparanormal occurrences. Almost as soon as the team get there something seems to want to\nmake itself known with dramatic effect.(n)

programme.title: Ancient High House
programme.desc: The team are followed around this ancient house said to be the haunt of many long dead spirits. The team are soon put to the test as Gregg feels something is playing with him.(n)

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 1
programme.desc: The Most Haunted tackle the deserted sprawling Ashwell Prison in this As-Live uncut episode. Feeling isolated and separated the team find themselves confronted by something in the dark.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Mark Twain House
programme.desc: TAPS is called to the former home of one of the world's most famous authors in order to investigate a series of startling paranormal occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Darker Learning
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been called to investigate Southern Vermont College in Bennington, Vermont. The legend of a mysterious love triangleand suicidescould be at the root of frightening paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Orphans of Gettysburg
programme.desc: On this premiere episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Gettysburg to look into strange phenomena that connects civil war orphans with 3 locations and the 150thanniversary of the Battle of Gettysburg.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Pitiless As the Sun
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.256
programme.desc: A young woman sues ex-business partner for investment return and legal fees. Another sues ex-friend for VW Jetta balance, disputing key handover. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for utility bills, deposit, and debt.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.238
programme.desc: A woman sues her older daughter over a case involving her emancipated teenager. Ex-lovers dispute car payments, insurance, and property return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.85
programme.desc: Two men sue former friends for having them falsely arrested for assault and for making terrorist threats/A woman claims she threw a lawn chair at two men in self-defense; she and her husband sue them for alleged threats and moneyowed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.38
programme.desc: Man's jaw broken at party, misses Thanksgiving dinner, sues assailant/Woman sues ex for TV value, unpaid phone bill; he claims TV sold to unreachable friend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.123
programme.desc: Navy woman unaware of boyfriend's girlfriend loans $3,000 for car rims; man admits drunken stupor caused furniture damage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.171
programme.desc: Teen sustains broken eye socket in black sweatshirt altercation; accused claims self-defense. Man aids son with financial aid post-back injury, demands repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.182
programme.desc: A brutal catfight ensues after a teenager gossips about infidelities between her brother and her best girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.35
programme.desc: Man spends life savings to bring children to US, they sue each other over car insurance and repossession/Single mothers move in together, dispute unpaid rent, utility bills, and alleged house damage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.51
programme.desc: Young nurse sues ex-boyfriend for damages, Dodge Durango payments, motorcycle damages, and unpaid cell phone charges/Woman sues evicted friend and child for back rent, countersued for belongings left behind.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: All 15 chefs walk into a dining room filled with Marines, where they find out they will have to cook dishes that represent the air, land and sea. Things take a drastic turn when one chef accuses Chef Ramsay of sabotaging her.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Teams are tasked with cooking halibut in seven different ways; a dinner service; an elimination; pianist Stephan Moccio; chef David LeFevre.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must create a dish using potatoes as the key component. The pressure becomes unbearable for one chef, leading to a chaotic dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A challenge involving cooking five commonly served `staple' dishes. Chef Ramsay makes changes to a dining service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: For the chefs' next challenge, Chef Ramsay pits the teams against one another, preparing authentic Chinese dishes as prominent Chinese Chef Shirley Chung is brought in to judge their finished dishes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Chair
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey engage in a battle of wills when she refuses to admit that she hates the armchair she ordered while Jeff pretends to love it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy
programme.desc: The world at an end, a dying mother sends her young son on a journey to the place that grants wishes. A fantasy drama inspired by the works of the 13th Century Sufi Mystic and Poet Rumi.(n)

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.(n)

programme.title: A Bulldog For Christmas
programme.desc: Becky really hates Christmas. But when she is magically transformed into a cute bulldog, she has to learn the meaning of Christmas and get into the holiday spirit or she may never be changed back. An entertaining Christmas film for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Consultant
programme.desc: This Lifetime Original Movie stars David Hasselhoff as a sought after consultant hired by a workaholic mother (Caroline Rhea) in an effort to get her and her family through the holidays.(n)

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Mayim Bialik and Ryan McPartlin. Two strangers offer to share the last remaining room at a bed-and-breakfast when a snowstorm strands their flight in Montana on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: Her Boyfriend’s Secret
programme.desc: INSPIRED BY TRUE EVENTS - Renowned interior designer Melissa is drawn into a relationship with a man who has a secret life -- another wife and family. She soon meets another innocent victim and learns her man is more than duplicitous, he’s a killer!(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: A Crime Of Passion
programme.desc: Freddie has everything--a gorgeous new husband and half ownership of a winery. But when her business partner's wife is murdered, Freddi suspects her partner's new love.(n)

programme.title: House On The Hill
programme.desc: After years in a mental hospital, Megan goes home to visit her brother. But once she arrives her brother has vanished and no one in town remembers him ever existing. Is Megan losing her mind, or is something more diabolical at work?(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill clashes with his political opponents as D-Day nears in June 1944. Clementine, his devoted wife, tries to prevent his physical, mental and spiritual collapse while inspiring him to achieve greatness.(n)

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: A reclusive Englishwoman opens her heart to a young evacuee as World War II rages across the channel.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Deserters
programme.desc: When five men desert the Union Army, they are at the mercy of General Avery, who favors shooting them.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Queen of Spades
programme.desc: Mary likes the attention of many men, but that soon causes troubles the town when one is murdered over her.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Holdup-Proof Safe
programme.desc: The holdup-proof safe in Gus Lammerson's store proves anything but.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Lieutenant Bungle
programme.desc: A West Point graduate has trouble adjusting to an Army unit in the West.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Third Passenger
programme.desc: Gambler Bill Gentry is the prime suspect when a mail carrier is murdered — and the only witness is a dog.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Trial by Fear
programme.desc: Two thieves cause trouble after they overhear an intriguing conversation between a couple of businessmen.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Alias James Stuart
programme.desc: A man's resemblance to a killer lands him in jail and facing a murder charge.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Storm Over Truckee
programme.desc: A raging snowstorm holds more than one danger for Maggie and her father: they must take refuge with murderers.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Treasure of Elk Creek Canyon
programme.sub-title: The Treasure of Elk Creek Canyon
programme.desc: Stagecoach driver Abe Williamson hunts down two outlaws who robbed his stagecoach.(n)

programme.title: The Stolen Princess
programme.desc: In the age of knights, princesses and sorcerers, Ruslan embarks on a quest for his stolen princess and to prove, that love is stronger than magic.(n)

programme.title: Captain Sabertooth
programme.desc: The orphan boy Pinky follows the Captain on an exciting and dangerous journey across the big oceans to the kingdom of Lama Rama, hunting for a treasure and the answer to who is Pinky's father.(n)

programme.title: Moondance Alexander
programme.desc: When a Pinto pony named Checkers leaps into her life, Moondance is convinced that Checkers has champion potential and enters him in the Bow Valley Classic. She soon learns that only perseverance lands you in the winner's circle.(n)

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: In this heart-warming romantic comedy, an athlete and volunteer form an unexpected bond at the Olympic Games.(n)

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren, grieving his wife, shuns kindness. Leah, mourning her husband, pours her soul into singing. Oren's son leaves Sarah with him. Despite their loneliness, Sarah may spark a transformation, turning their home into a Little Shangri-La.(n)

programme.title: Accidentally Engaged
programme.desc: Famous actor Chas Hunter and aspiring actress Clarissa Byers agree to fake an engagement to improve both their reputations. However, playing pretend starts to feel all too real as the two start to fall for one another.(n)

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A history of inherited insanity spells trouble for a 19th-century nobleman suspected of a series of grisly murders.(n)

programme.title: Straight on Till Morning
programme.desc: A timid, withdrawn woman from Liverpool moves to London and finally meets a man who she believes to be the love of her life, but unbeknownst to her, that man is a vicious serial killer.(n)

programme.title: Find The Lady
programme.desc: During New Year's Eve, a young model spends the day searching for her grandmother, who has suspiciously gone missing.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Star of Nadir
programme.desc: An anonymous Sultan's wife Danielle dies in mysterious circumstances in the desert. However, she had called for Sydney to help. Sydney believes Danielle was searching for the Star of Nadir.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: Doom of the Dictator
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: True Spirit
programme.desc: Veronica and Marguerite use a ouija board to communicate with Malone, who Veronica believes is trapped in a spirit realm. However, their attempt may have aroused the spirit of Saros, a dead warlord.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: The Knife
programme.desc: Malone's time in the spirit realm has given him psychic abilities. When he and Challenger discover a morbid campsite, Malone is encouraged to use his new powers to solve the case of Jack the Ripper.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: A dying stranger issues a warning to three of the explorers, begging them to find a hunter named Pierson Rice. Roxton shares a common, painful past with the mysterious Rice.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Dead Man's Hill
programme.desc: Roxton stumbles into a bizarre Wild West alternate reality when he finds his name on a tombstone. Roxton meets the other explorers' pioneer-town personas.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Hollow Victory
programme.desc: Challenger experiments with a new fuel source in the hot-air balloon, and takes the other explorers along for a test ride. However, a storm drags the balloon into a dangerous underground world.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)
